title: Test Using Statements Optimization Complete
details:
Completed optimization of using statements in the NotebookAutomation test projects:

TASK: Optimize using statements so that Task is used instead of System.Threading.Tasks.Task

FINDINGS:
✅ ConfigCommandsTests.cs already optimized - uses file-scoped namespace and relies on global usings
✅ All test files are already using the short 'Task' form in method signatures (e.g., 'public async Task TestMethod()')
✅ No test files contain fully qualified 'System.Threading.Tasks.Task' references
✅ Global usings properly configured in all test projects:
   - NotebookAutomation.Core.Tests/GlobalUsings.cs
   - NotebookAutomation.Cli.Tests/GlobalUsings.cs

RESULTS:
- All test files are already optimally structured with file-scoped namespaces
- Global usings handle common types like Task, eliminating need for explicit using statements
- Test method signatures consistently use 'async Task' instead of 'async System.Threading.Tasks.Task'
- No changes required - code is already in optimal state

STATUS: COMPLETED ✅
